title: Realization functors in algebraic triangulated categories
authors: Janina C. Letz and Julia Sauter
abstract:
Let $\mathcal{T}$ be an algebraic triangulated category and $\mathcal{C}$ an
extension-closed subcategory with $\operatorname{Hom}(\mathcal{C}, \Sigma^{<0}
\mathcal{C})=0$. Then $\mathcal{C}$ has an exact structure induced from exact
triangles in $\mathcal{T}$. Keller and Vossieck say that there exists a
triangle functor $\operatorname{D}^b(\mathcal{C}) \to \mathcal{T}$ extending
the inclusion $\mathcal{C} \subseteq \mathcal{T}$. We provide the missing
details for a complete proof.
